title: Fundamentals of Leadership
description: Interdisciplinary approach to leadership combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.

title: Introduction to Economics
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of economics. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.

title: Intermediate Finance
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of finance. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.

title: Intermediate Management
description: Rigorous treatment of management theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.

title: Operations
description: Advanced exploration of operations covering current research and industry practices.

title: Leadership
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of leadership. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.

title: Advanced Marketing
description: Advanced exploration of marketing covering current research and industry practices.

title: Graduate Leadership
description: Comprehensive study of leadership with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.
prerequisites: BUSI 327 and senior standing or graduate status
